title: 多世界地皮怎么不刷怪
author: wzdsqq
txt_content: RT，。。。多世界地皮怎么不刷怪

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set monsters true
/mv modify set diff 1
执行这两个命令

replies.author: canyu1111
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set difficulty 0 不刷怪
第一步设置无怪/mv modify set monsters false
 第二步设置无动物/mv modify set animals false
 第三步清理实体 /mv purge all

replies.author: yuankun1
replies.txt_content: 输入/gamerule doMobSpawning false禁止生物生成【既有生物、怪物蛋不受影响】然后发送（默认为回车键）即可。
